entries.title: BackPAN on CPAN Testers
entries.text: BackPAN is the place where everything uploaded to CPAN is being stored. Even thing that have been already deleted from CPAN. Now there are a bunch of files that can help you dig out modules from the distant past.

entries.title: What's new on CPAN - June 2014
entries.text: A list of modules recently uploaded to CPAN by David Farrell.

A graph showing the number of CPAN uploads by month, by week and by day. The week-ends are weaker and on the 31 of each month there is a huge drop in the number of uploads. Maybe because half the monthes don't have day 31...
